SEARCH
Package com.example.tigers_lottery

Class DatabaseHelper

java.lang.Object
com.example.tigers_lottery.DatabaseHelper
public class DatabaseHelper extends Object
Helper class for interacting with Firebase Firestore database. Manages database operations for the "events" and "users" collections. Provides methods to fetch and add events and users, along with utility methods to get user counts.

  • Constructor Details

    • DatabaseHelper

      public DatabaseHelper(android.content.Context context)
      Constructor for DatabaseHelper. Initializes Firestore instance and sets up references to "events" and "users" collections.
      Parameters:
      context - context for the helper's usage.

  • Method Details

    • isAdminUser

      public void isAdminUser(String userId, DatabaseHelper.VerificationCallback callback)
      Checks if a user with the given userId exists in the admins collection.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user to check.
      callback - A callback that returns true if the user exists, false otherwise.

    • storeAdminAuthCode

      public void storeAdminAuthCode(String generatedCode, DatabaseHelper.Callback callback)
      Stores a generated admin code in the 'admin_auth_codes' collection.
      Parameters:
      generatedCode - The code to store in Firestore.
      callback - Callback to handle success or failure.

    • addUserToAdmins

      public void addUserToAdmins(String deviceId, String authCode, DatabaseHelper.Callback callback)
      Adds a user to the 'admins' collection in Firestore. Deletes the admin auth code from 'admin_auth_codes' after successful admin addition.
      Parameters:
      deviceId - The device ID to add as an admin.
      authCode - The admin auth code to delete after verification.
      callback - Callback to handle success or failure.

    • deleteAdminAuthCode

      public void deleteAdminAuthCode(String code, DatabaseHelper.Callback callback)
      This method removes unused admin authentication codes
      Parameters:
      code - - auth that needs to be removed
      callback - - Callback to handle success or failure.

    • getCurrentUserId

      public String getCurrentUserId()
      Get the userId of the person running an instance of the app.
      Returns:
      user's id

    • organizerFetchEvents

      public void organizerFetchEvents(DatabaseHelper.EventsCallback callback)
      Fetches events for the organizer dashboard, showing only the current user's hosted events
      Parameters:
      callback - The callback to handle the list of events or error.

    • fetchEventById

      public void fetchEventById(int eventId, DatabaseHelper.EventsCallback callback)
      Finds an event by its eventId.
      Parameters:
      eventId - event to be found.
      callback - handles success/failure of the fetching operation.

    • createEvent

      public void createEvent(Event event, DatabaseHelper.EventsCallback callback)
      Creates a new unique event. Hardcoded test code may be removed in the future. The new event is given a unique 5 digit identification.
      Parameters:
      event - to be created
      callback - handles success/failure of event creation.

    • getEventCount

      public void getEventCount(DatabaseHelper.CountCallback callback)
      Helper method to find the amount of events.
      Parameters:
      callback - handles success/failure of event count operation.

    • fetchAllEvents

      public void fetchAllEvents(DatabaseHelper.EventsCallback callback)
      Fetches all events from the events collection without any conditions.
      Parameters:
      callback - handles success/failure of the fetching process.

      Parameters:
      eventId - to be deleted.
      callback - handles success/failure of deletion.

      callback - handles success/failure of the fetching operation.

    • updateInvitedEntrantsAndSetLotteryRan

      public void updateInvitedEntrantsAndSetLotteryRan(int eventId, List<String> invitedEntrants, DatabaseHelper.EventsCallback callback)
      Updates invited entrants list after lottery is ran by organizer
      Parameters:
      eventId - event to be updated.
      invitedEntrants - entrants that have won the lottery.
      callback - handles success/failure of the update process.

    • selectRandomEntrants

      public List<String> selectRandomEntrants(List<String> entrants, int count)
      Helper function to select random entrants.
      Parameters:
      entrants - to choose from.
      count - amount of entrants to choose.
      Returns:
      entrants that were selected

    • addDeclineListener

      public void addDeclineListener(int eventId, DatabaseHelper.DeclineCallback callback)
      Listen for changes in the declined entrants list; If someone declines they're added here and we must re-pick randomly to fill their spot
      Parameters:
      eventId - event whose declined list changed.
      callback - handles success/failure of the listener.

    • updateEntrantsAfterDecline

      public void updateEntrantsAfterDecline(int eventId, List<String> invitedEntrants, List<String> waitlistedEntrants, DatabaseHelper.EventsCallback callback)
      Update both the waitlisted entrants list as well as the invited entrants list, after someone declines an invitation and someone else is picked to fill that spot
      Parameters:
      eventId - to be updated
      invitedEntrants - list of invited entrants
      waitlistedEntrants - list of waitlisted entrants
      callback - handles success/failure of the update operation.

    • removeUserFromInvitedEntrants

      public void removeUserFromInvitedEntrants(Integer eventId, String userId)

    • removeUserFromWaitlistedEntrants

    • removeUserFromRegisteredEntrants

      public void removeUserFromRegisteredEntrants(Integer eventId, String userId)
      Removes a user from the registered entrants list of an event.
      Parameters:
      eventId - event the user is a part of.
      userId - user to be removed from the registered entrants list.

    • removeUserFromDeclinedEntrants

      public void removeUserFromDeclinedEntrants(Integer eventId, String userId)
      Removes a user from the declined entrants list of an event.
      Parameters:
      eventId - event the user is a part of.
      userId - user to be removed from the registered entrants list.

    • clearEventLists

      public void clearEventLists(int eventId, DatabaseHelper.EventsCallback callback)
      Clears the waitlisted, invited, and declined entrants lists for a given event. Also removes this event ID from each user's joined events list.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event whose lists need to be cleared.
      callback - The EventsCallback to handle success or failure.

    • fetchAllUsers

      public void fetchAllUsers(DatabaseHelper.UsersCallback callback)
      Fetches all users from the "users" collection.
      Parameters:
      callback - The callback to handle the list of users or error.

    • addUser

      public void addUser(HashMap<String,Object> userData, android.net.Uri imageUri)
      Adds a user to the firestore database along with their data.
      Parameters:
      userData - user object to be added
      imageUri - user's photo

    • fetchUserById

      public void fetchUserById(String userId, DatabaseHelper.UsersCallback callback)
      Grabs a user from the users collection by the userID
      Parameters:
      userId - - Device of that linked user
      callback - - callback interface for users

    • checkUserExists

      public void checkUserExists(DatabaseHelper.ProfileCallback callback)
      Check if the user exists in the database.
      Parameters:
      callback - handles success/failure of checking if a user exists.

      public void removeUser(String userId)
      This method removed a user from the DB
      Parameters:

    • uploadPosterImageToFirebase

      public void uploadPosterImageToFirebase(android.net.Uri imageUri, DatabaseHelper.UploadCallback callback)
      Uploads image to firebase storage and passes url back through callback
      Parameters:
      imageUri - URI of image to be uploaded.
      callback - methods for handling success/failure of upload.

    • entrantFetchEvents

      public void entrantFetchEvents(DatabaseHelper.EventsCallback callback)
      Gets the events that the user is apart of, for any list that the user is part of for any event, that event is passed to callback.
      Parameters:
      callback - methods for handling success/failure.

    • entrantLeaveWaitingList

      public void entrantLeaveWaitingList(int eventId, DatabaseHelper.StatusCallback callback)
      Removes the current user from a waiting list for an event.
      Parameters:
      eventId - event that the entrant should be removed from the waiting list of.
      callback - handles success/failure of waiting list removal for an entrant.

    • entrantAcceptDeclineInvitation

      public void entrantAcceptDeclineInvitation(int eventId, String action, DatabaseHelper.StatusCallback callback)
      Handles the actions for an entrant to accept or decline an invitation for an event after being a part of the event and winning the lottery.
      Parameters:
      eventId - event that the user won the lottery for
      action - accept or decline from the user.
      callback - handles success/failure of add/decline operation.

    • addEntrantWaitlist

      public void addEntrantWaitlist(int eventId, String userId, DatabaseHelper.EventsCallback callback)
      Method to add an entrant to a waitlist using the eventId of the event. User is added to waitlist if they are not already a part of it.
      Parameters:
      eventId - to be joined
      userId - current user that wants to join the waitlist
      callback - handles the results of the method
